simulated_ratings.feeling: Informative, but issue-driven docs like this just don't engage me.

simulated_ratings.title: Faces of Death (1978)

simulated_ratings.title: Dracula (Bram Stoker's Dracula) (1992)

simulated_ratings.title: Day the Earth Caught Fire, The (1961)

simulated_ratings.title: The Brothers Grimsby (2016)

simulated_ratings.title: Jackass Number Two (2006)

simulated_ratings.title: First Wives Club, The (1996)

simulated_ratings.title: Woman of Paris, A (1923)

simulated_ratings.title: Marty (1955)
